mapper.sql: select pass_flag,id, students_id, submit_flag, create_date, update_date, del_flag, homework_id, file_id, file_name from school_homework_detail
mapper.select: select sc.nameclass as 'class', c.students_name as 'course', sh.homework_name as 'homework', sh.id as 'homeworkid', (select count(*) from schoolstudentslist where class_id = s.class_id) as 'studentnum', (select icon from schoolstudentslist where class_id = s.class_id limit 0,1) as 'stu1', (select icon from schoolstudentslist where class_id = s.class_id limit 1,1) as 'stu2', (select icon from schoolstudentslist where class_id = s.class_id limit 2,1) as 'stu3', (select icon from schoolstudentslist where class_id = s.class_id limit 3,1) as 'stu4', DATE_FORMAT(sh.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as 'time', shd.id as 'detailid' from school_homework_detail shd left join school_homework sh on sh.id = shd.homework_id left join coursemanagement c on c.id = sh.curriculum_id left join schoolstudentslist s on s.id = shd.students_id left join school_class sc on sc.id = s.class_id where 1=1 and ((sh.type=1) or (sh.type=2 and sh.starttime < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') and sh.endtime > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'))) and shd.students_id = #{studentid}

select shdd.submittime as 'submittime', shdd.ontest as 'ontest', shdd.file as 'file' from school_homework_detail_detail shdd where 1=1 and shdd.submittime like concat ('%',DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') , '%') and shdd.detailid=#{detailid} and shdd.studentid=#{studentid}

select shdd.submittime as 'submittime', shdd.ontest as 'ontest', shdd.id as 'praiseid', (select count(*) from user_praise where type=1 and praiseid=shdd.id) as 'praisenum', (select count(*) from user_praise where type=1 and usertype=1 and praiseid=shdd.id and userid=#{studentid}) as 'ispraise' from school_homework_detail_detail shdd where 1=1 and shdd.submittime < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') and shdd.detailid=#{detailid} and shdd.studentid=#{studentid}

SELECT s.id AS 'id', s.students_name AS 'name', s.icon AS 'icon', shdd.file AS 'file', shdd.ontest as 'ontest', shdd.id as 'praiseid', (select count(*) from user_praise where type=1 and praiseid=shdd.id) as 'praisenum', (select count(*) from user_praise where type=1 and usertype=1 and praiseid=shdd.id and userid=#{studentid}) as 'ispraise' FROM schoolstudentslist s left join ( SELECT shdd.* FROM school_homework_detail_detail shdd LEFT JOIN school_homework_detail shd ON shd.id = shdd.detailid WHERE 1=1 AND shdd.submittime LIKE concat ( '%', #{submittime}, '%' ) AND shd.homework_id = #{homeworkid} ) shdd on shdd.studentid = s.id WHERE 1=1 and s.class_id = #{classid} and s.id <> #{studentid}

select sc.nameclass as 'classname', c.students_name as 'coursename', (select count(*) from schoolstudentslist where class_id = s.class_id) as 'stunum', sh.homework_name as 'homeworkname', (select icon from schoolstudentslist where class_id = s.class_id limit 0,1) as 'stu1', (select icon from schoolstudentslist where class_id = s.class_id limit 1,1) as 'stu2', (select icon from schoolstudentslist where class_id = s.class_id limit 2,1) as 'stu3', (select icon from schoolstudentslist where class_id = s.class_id limit 3,1) as 'stu4', sh.create_date as 'createdate', s.class_id as 'classid', shd.homework_id as 'homeworkid' from school_homework_detail shd left join schoolstudentslist s on s.id = shd.students_id left join school_class sc on sc.id = s.class_id left join school_homework sh on sh.id = shd.homework_id left join coursemanagement c on c.id = sh.curriculum_id where shd.homework_id in ( select sh.id from coursemanagement c left join school_homework sh on c.id = sh.curriculum_id where c.teacher_id = #{teacherid} and sh.curriculum_id in (select id from coursemanagement where teacher_id = #{teacherid}) ) and ((sh.type=1) or (sh.type=2 and sh.starttime < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') and sh.endtime > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'))) group by shd.homework_id,s.class_id

SELECT s.id AS 'studentid', s.students_name AS 'name', s.icon AS 'icon', shdd.file AS 'file', shdd.ontest AS 'ontest', shdd.id as 'detailid', shdd.id as 'praiseid', (select count(*) from user_praise where type=1 and praiseid=shdd.id) as 'praisenum', (select count(*) from user_praise where type=1 and usertype=2 and praiseid=shdd.id and userid=#{teacherid}) as 'ispraise' FROM schoolstudentslist s left join ( SELECT shdd.* FROM school_homework_detail_detail shdd LEFT JOIN school_homework_detail shd ON shd.id = shdd.detailid WHERE shdd.submittime LIKE concat ( '%', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'), '%' ) AND shd.homework_id = #{homeworkid} ) shdd on shdd.studentid = s.id WHERE 1=1 and s.class_id = #{classid}
